contents:
加拿大這麽沒有存在感嗎…… 😓

南華早報1月30日：“China coronavirus: Canada to evacuate citizens from flu-hit region” https://www.scmp.com/news/world/united-states-canada/article/3048146/china-coronavirus-canada-evacuate-citizens-flu-hit

GlobalNews.ca 1月31日更新：“Coronavirus: Some ‘vulnerable’ Canadian diplomatic staff, dependants evacuated from China” https://globalnews.ca/news/6486946/canada-diplomatic-staff-evacuation/

兩篇報道都提到160名在華的加拿大人尋求了領事幫助。具體撤僑進度和診療情況需進一步瞭解。
